memberdef.name: HttpApiService

Initializes a new instance of the HttpApiService class.

parameterdescription.para: A token to cancel the operation.

simplesect.para: A task containing the API response.

parameterdescription.para: Thrown when the operation is cancelled.

para.para: Sends an HTTP request and deserializes the response asynchronously.

simplesect.para: A task containing the deserialized response body.

parameterdescription.para: Thrown when the request fails or returns an error status.
Thrown when the operation is cancelled.
A CancellationToken that can be used to cancel the disposal operation.

simplesect.para: A ValueTask representing the asynchronous operation.

para.para: Override this method to release async resources such as streams, database connections, or other async-disposable objects.

briefdescription.para: Configures the HttpClient with base settings.
Gets the client certificate for authentication.

simplesect.para: The X.509 certificate, or null if not configured.

briefdescription.para: Builds an HttpRequestMessage from an ApiRequest.
Adds authentication to the HTTP request.

Builds an ApiResponse from an HttpResponseMessage.
HTTP API service implementation using HttpClient.
